summary: This module provides a PyTorch‑based spherical harmonics encoder that converts input vectors into higher‑dimensional feature representations using a custom forward/backward helper. It includes a lightweight utility for the core encoding operations and a higher‑level encoder class with standard initialization and representation methods, optimized for GPU execution.
business_intent: Enable efficient, GPU‑accelerated feature encoding for neural rendering pipelines such as NeRF, improving training speed and model quality when processing positional or directional data.
